remarks: Not-free for restricted existential quantification where ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct.  See ~ nfrexdya for a version with ` y ` and ` A ` distinct instead.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-May-2018.)
statement:
nfraldxy.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
nfraldxy.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
nfraldxy.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ps ) $.
nfrexdxy $p |- ( ph -> F/ x E. y e. A ps ) $.
$d x y $.
